Translations.Text: Win id iusan s ise$, ad iawi it yifen. Widak, assen, mevmunit si tugdi
Wid id iusan s tucmip, ad ppin wudmawen nnsen ar tmes. Ni$ a ppeppuqeiiim kan $ef wayen txeddmem
Pwamoe$ kan ad aabde$ Mass n temdint agi, i Ioqa. IneS yal cci. Pwamoe$ d ad ili$ seg imduaen
ad male$ Leqwoan. Win ipwanhan, ipwanha kan i iman is. Win innetlafen, ini: "nek d aneddao kan
Ini: "a neckeo Oebbi. Ad awen Issken issekniyen iS. A ten taaqlem". Mass ik ur I$effel ara $ef wayen txeddmem
Ad ak d Neeku si tequii n Musa akked Feraun, s tidep, i ugdud iumnen
Ih, Feraun issem$weo iman is di tmurt; imezda$ ifeoq iten d ieoumen. Isrewrew iayfa segsen, izellu arrac nnsen, issidir tilawin nnsen. Ih, neppa seg ifessaden
Neb$a a Nfeooeo $ef wid irewrwen di tmurt, a ten Nerr d imeqwoanen, a ten Nerr d iweooaten
